tool_description: Identifies urgent warning signs and red flag symptoms that require immediate medical attention or emergency intervention.

symptoms.description: List of patient symptoms to evaluate for red flags

onset_pattern.description: Symptom onset: sudden, acute, gradual, chronic

error_messages: Empty symptoms list: Provide at least one symptom to evaluate for red flags.
Invalid onset pattern: Use sudden, acute, gradual, or chronic.
Invalid vital signs format: Vital signs must be provided as descriptive strings.
Critical assessment failed: Unable to process symptoms for red flag detection.
usage: Input patient symptoms, vital signs, and onset pattern. The tool identifies any red flag indicators that suggest urgent medical conditions requiring immediate attention.

red_flags_detected.description: List of identified red flag symptoms or combinations

urgency_level.description: Overall urgency assessment: emergency, urgent, semi-urgent, routine

emergency_conditions.description: Possible emergency conditions suggested by red flags
